name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_contract_days
title: Amount of time to enter into contract to sell property
label: Contract Days
description: Within how many days after acceptance of this offer will you enter into a contract to sell your current property?
tips: Consider your market conditions and how quickly properties are selling in your area when determining the number of days needed.
small_print: Keep in mind that sellers could be reluctant to accept an offer contingent upon a residence that is not already in escrow. Sometimes waiting until you have acceptance on your existing home could benefit you more in the long run as well as make for a smoother set of transactions.

internal.notes: Days allowed to enter contract for existing property
